services.experience-text: Long-term experience in transporting goods in Europe and the CIS countries
services.safety-text: Vehicles that meet EURO-5, EURO-6 safety standards
services.tracking-text: Cargo movement tracking 24 hours a day
services.speed-text: Relatively high speed and low transportation risk

about.about-text1: Having started its operations in 1998, UAB "Autrona" can today offer its clients high-quality logistics services that meet their needs throughout Europe and the CIS countries. By responsibly fulfilling our obligations, we have earned the trust of our regular clients and partners.
about.about-text2: We are proud that UAB "Autrona" has been awarded the "Gazelle of the Year" award for several years in a row. Since 1998, the company has been a member of the Lithuanian National Association of Road Carriers.
about.our-mission-text: To provide efficient and professional logistics services - to deliver your cargo safely, qualitatively and quickly to its destination. To carry out activities with a responsible attitude towards the environment and using the latest technologies.
about.our-vision-text1: As a reliable and innovative partner, we work to become a part of your success story.
about.our-vision-text3: a team of professional employees and continuous investments in new and modern vehicles, because only this ensures the quality and efficiency of the services provided.

career.looking-for: We are currently looking for the following specialists:
career.cargo-transportation: Cargo transportation from Western Europe to CIS countries
career.required-experience: Work experience in the field of freight transportation is required
career.driving-license: Driving licenses B, CE, C1E, C categories
career.languages: Good command of Russian, knowledge of other languages ​is a great advantage
career.send-cvs: Please send your CV to the following email address:

cargo.basis-text1: International transportation of standard, packaged, non-hazardous, non-temperature controlled, full FTL cargo by tilt semi-trailer.
cargo.basis-text2: Real-time tracking systems allow us to monitor our shipments, while data analysis optimizes routes, reduces costs and improves environmental sustainability.
cargo.tons-title: Tons of cargo delivered per year
cargo.quality-text: - we transport cargo safely, fulfill orders on time, provide information quickly
cargo.flexibility-text: - large capacities, long-term agreements and unit shipments at market prices
cargo.trailer-measurements: 13.62 m x 2.48 m x 2.70 m (length / width / height)
